sentences.en: All the tins were scoured, and the tables scrubbed snowy white.
sentences.cn: 所有的锡器都擦光了, 桌子都刷得雪白.

sentences.en: All the wet, snowy sidewalk was bright with this radiated fire.
sentences.cn: 整个泥泞积雪的人行道都被这片灯光照亮了.

sentences.en: Do you think your car will stand up well under such snowy conditions?
sentences.cn: 你认为你的车在积雪的条件下还能耐用 吗 ?

sentences.en: He keeps up his long - distance running whether it's windy or snowy.
sentences.cn: 刮风也罢,下雪也罢,他都坚持 长跑.

sentences.en: He returned and gazed out upon a snowy February landscape.
sentences.cn: 他又回过头去凝视着外面二月天的雪景.

sentences.en: She remembered a snowy day seven years ago.
sentences.cn: 过去的情景带着恐怖回来了.

sentences.en: The little creature was daintily decked out in soft, snowy muslin.
sentences.cn: 那可爱的小姑娘打扮得很漂亮,穿着柔软白净的薄纱衫.

sentences.en: The old man combed his snowy hair.
The snowy Alps stand out in bold relief against the blue sky.
sentences.cn: 白雪皑皑的阿尔卑斯山在蓝色天空的衬托下鲜明地耸立着.

sentences.en: The snowy main peak towers above all the others.
sentences.cn: 白雪皑皑的主峰高耸在群峦之上.

sentences.en: The snowy street, like the church, assumed a dumb, lifeless aspect.
sentences.cn: 积雪覆盖的街道就像教堂一样，显得沉闷、毫无生气。

sentences.en: The weather has been very snowy recently.
They often stood sentry on snowy nights.
We arrived on Washington's Birthday, a freezing , blowy, snowy day.
sentences.cn: 我们到的那天正是华盛顿的诞辰, 风雪交加, 天气极冷.

sentences.en: We strode across the snowy fields.
sentences.cn: 我们大步流星地穿过雪封的旷野。

words.tran_cn: 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的

trans.tran_cn: 下雪的，被雪覆盖的，雪白的，洁白无瑕的，多雪的
